name: Cartoons And Comics Part 9 Quiz | Comics & Cartoons | 10 Questions

questions.text: In what comic strip would we find Lothar?
questions.explanation:
Mandrake The Magician.

	This comic strip was created by Lee Falk in 1934.

questions.text: Which of the following was not one of Popeye's nephews?
questions.explanation:
Pinkeye.

	Pipeye was the fourth nephew.

questions.text: Name the cat who is in love with Ignatz the mouse.
questions.explanation:
Krazy Cat.

	Offissa Pupp is the other character.

Mr. Weatherbee

	'Archie' began in the issue of 'Pep Comics' in the year 1941.

questions.text: What is Olive Oyl's brother's name?
What is the name of Smokey Stover's cat?
questions.explanation:
Spooky.

	This comic strip was created by Bill Holman in 1935.

questions.text: Min and Andy were characters in which comic strip?
questions.explanation:
The Gumps.

	Chester was also a character in this comic strip which ran from 1917-1959.

questions.text: In the comic strip 'Dick Tracy', B.O. Plenty's initials stood for what?
questions.explanation:
Bob Oscar.

	Plenty married Gravel Gertie in 1946. They were two of the many 'Dick Tracy' characters.

questions.text: The Polecats were an Indian tribe in which comic strip?
questions.explanation:
Li'l Abner.

	Created by Al Capp. It ran from 1934-1977.

questions.text: What comic strip character is associated with the expression 'leaping lizards'?
questions.explanation:
Little Orphan Annie.

	This strip first ran as 'Little Orphan Annie' from 1924-1979 then as 'Annie' from 1979 to present.
